content.raw:
I added a [demo](https://github.com/osrf/ros1_ign/pull/32) to `ros1_ign` and it looks like there are some issues with the point cloud coming from the depth camera. The RGBD camera's cloud still looks ok.

![depth_camera_bridge.png](data/bitbucket.org/repo/da5rgr4/images/1719418551-depth_camera_bridge.png)

It looks like something needs to be handled in the color channels, and something seems flipped in the vertical positions.
content.html:
I added a demo to ros1_ign and it looks like there are some issues with the point cloud coming from the depth camera. The RGBD camera's cloud still looks ok.

It looks like something needs to be handled in the color channels, and something seems flipped in the vertical positions.
